CustomField.formula: if ( OR( $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusSiteAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusUltimateAccount, $User.ProfileId == $Label.USR_ProfileId_PFCommunityPlusClientAccount) , IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouvelle"), Requete_en_attente__c ==FALSE),IMAGE("/client/resource/1556207842000/Case_Nouvelle_V2?","Nouvelle",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouvelle"), Requete_en_attente__c ==TRUE),IMAGE("/client/resource/1556207856000/Case_Nouvelle_Attente_V2?","Attente",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"En_Cours"), Requete_en_attente__c ==FALSE),IMAGE("/client/resource/1561547731000/Case_EnCours_V2?","En Cours",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"En_Cours"), Requete_en_attente__c == TRUE),IMAGE("/client/resource/1556207885000/Case_EnCours_Attente_V2?","Attente",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Terminee"),IMAGE("/client/resource/1556207905000/Case_Ferme_V2?","Terminée",20,130),''))))) , IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouvelle"), Requete_en_attente__c ==FALSE),IMAGE("/resource/1556207842000/Case_Nouvelle_V2?","Nouvelle",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Nouvelle"), Requete_en_attente__c ==TRUE),IMAGE("/resource/1556207856000/Case_Nouvelle_Attente_V2?","Attente",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"En_Cours"), Requete_en_attente__c ==FALSE),IMAGE("/resource/1561547731000/Case_EnCours_V2?","En Cours",20,130), IF (AND(ISPICKVAL(Status,"En_Cours"), Requete_en_attente__c == TRUE),IMAGE("/resource/1556207885000/Case_EnCours_Attente_V2?","Attente",20,130), IF (ISPICKVAL(Status,"Terminee"),IMAGE("/resource/1556207905000/Case_Ferme_V2?","Terminée",20,130),''))))) )
CustomField.label: Statut
